title: crash error "unexpected fault address 0x0"
body:
# üêû Bug Report

Can't finish syncing, getting crash error `unexpected fault address 0x0`

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

version from a few months ago seemed to be working

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

```sh
docker run \
	--name beacon \
	-it \
	-d \
	--restart=unless-stopped \
	--network="host" \
	--log-driver local \
	--log-opt max-size=2gb \
	-p 4000:4000 \
	-p 13000:13000 \
	-p 12000:12000/udp \
	-p 3500:3500 \
	-v $HOME/geth_jwt:/geth_jwt:ro \
	-v $HOME/.eth2_beacon_chain_data:/data \
	gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:stable \
	--datadir=/data \
	--rpc-host=0.0.0.0 \
	--grpc-gateway-host=0.0.0.0 \
	--monitoring-host=0.0.0.0 \
	--enable-debug-rpc-endpoints \
	--grpc-max-msg-size=65568081 \
	--accept-terms-of-use \
	--http-web3provider="$ETH1_PROVIDER"
```

## üî• Error


## üåç  Your Environment

**Operating System:**

```sh
Linux intelnuc 5.19.6-arch1-1 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Wed, 31 Aug 2022 22:09:40 +0000 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```

**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**

```sh
REPOSITORY                                TAG        IMAGE ID       CREATED        SIZE
gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain   stable     6ea5cb3b5d8a   13 days ago    125MB
```
